Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for the Azure Digital Twins implementation, including the scope, use cases, and expected outcomes. Identify IoT devices and data sources to be integrated.
Create a digital twin model that represents the physical environment and entities. Define relationships, properties, and telemetry data for each entity.

Tasks.Task: Set Up Azure Digital Twins Instance
Tasks.Task Description: Provision an Azure Digital Twins instance in the Azure portal. Configure the instance with the required settings and permissions.
Develop the twin graph using the Azure Digital Twins modeling language and upload it to the Azure Digital Twins instance.
Connect Azure IoT Hub to Azure Digital Twins to enable telemetry data ingestion from IoT devices.
Configure security measures such as role-based access control (RBAC), encryption, and secure connections for Azure Digital Twins and IoT Hub.
Create data processing logic using Azure Functions or other services to process telemetry data and update the twin graph.
Perform testing to ensure the digital twin model and integrations are functioning as expected. Validate data flow and twin graph updates.
Set up monitoring and alerting for Azure Digital Twins using Azure Monitor and other tools to track performance and detect issues.
Document the digital twin architecture, configurations, and operational procedures. Provide training materials for the operations team.
Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and security best practices for IoT and Azure Digital Twins.
